title: raamaa Eva deivatham
sahitya:
rAma Eva deivatam raghukula tilakO mE

caraNam 1

 vigata kAma mOhamadO vimala hrdaya shubha phaladO
   
caraNam 2

 jita gautama krta shApO nata varada sItapO
   
caraNam 3

 bhakta citta tapa harO bhAvuka dAna caturO
   
caraNam 4

 sura tAraka gaNa candrO mura narakEbha mrgEndrO
   
caraNam 5

 hari padmaja sharvEshO haridAshva su-sankAshO
   
caraNam 6

 tyAgarAja hrtsadanO nAgarAja vara shayanO
